header.info: Show for specific products, collections, tags, types or leave empty to show on all product pages.

enable_disable.content: To enable/disable a widget, go to 'Theme settings' > Debutify widgets.

enable_disable2.content: To enable/disable a widget, go to 'Theme settings' > Debutify widgets.

paragraph__2.content: To edit languages, go to Themes > Actions > Edit languages > Add-ons.

scrollbar_cursor.content: Customize scrollbars and cursors to match your brand's look and feel.

paragraph__1.content: The transparent header will be applied to homepage slideshow section as well as collection pages with images.

show_language_selector.label: Show language selector
show_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [languages settings](/admin/settings/languages).

show_country_selector.label: Show country selector
show_country_selector.info: To add a country, go to your [market settings](/admin/settings/markets).

border_radius.label: Border radius
border_radius.info: Set max value to get perfect circe.

show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_more_payment_options_button.label: Show more payment options button
show_more_payment_options_button.info: Dynamic checkout button must be enabled.

overlay_z_index.label: Overlays z-index
overlay_z_index.info: Increase that number if you have 3rd-party App's element showing over your cart drawer.

share_messenger.label: Share on Messenger
share_messenger.info: Messenger will only shows on mobile. Make sure to add your Facebook page ID below.

heading_font.label: Font
heading_font.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts).

text_font.label: Font
text_font.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts).

header__3.info: Configure font settings for menus and buttons.

accent_font.label: Font
accent_font.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts).

paragraph__1.content: Increase your average order value and encourage customers to buy more from your store.

enable_announcement_bar.label: Announcement Bar
enable_announcement_bar.info: Display important announcements and promotions at the top of your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155024-how-to-use-the-announcement-bar-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

paragraph__2.content: Foster customer loyalty and encourage repeat purchases.

enable_newsletter.label: Newsletter
enable_newsletter.info: Collect customer emails for sending out news, deals, and promotional content. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155033-how-to-use-the-breadcrumbs-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

paragraph__3.content: Enhance customer satisfaction and increase sales with frictionless shopping solutions.

enable_image_banner.label: Image banner
enable_image_banner.info: Display this banner on various pages of your store to draw attention to special offers or announcements. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155033-how-to-use-the-breadcrumbs-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

enable_scrollbar_cursor.label: Scrollbar & Cursor
enable_scrollbar_cursor.info: Customize your store's scrollbar and cursor to match your brand, enhancing the browsing experience with a unique, tailored touch. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9991615-how-to-use-the-scrollbar-and-cursor-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

paragraph__1.content: The [Growth plan](https://theme.debutify.com/plans/growth) can activate up to 10 widgets. The [Professional plan](https://theme.debutify.com/plans/pro) can activate up to 40 widgets. The [Enterprise plan](https://theme.debutify.com/plans/enterprise) can activate all current and future widgets.

paragraph__2.content: Increase your average order value and encourage customers to buy more from your store.

enable_addtocart_animation.label: Add-To-Cart Animation
enable_addtocart_animation.info: Add an animation to the product page add-to-cart button. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054044-how-to-enable-the-add-to-cart-animation-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_goal.label: Cart Goal
enable_cart_goal.info: Offer free shipping when a specific total cart amount is reached. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054070-how-to-use-the-cart-goal-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_reminder.label: Cart Reminder
enable_cart_reminder.info: Remind customers to checkout by displaying a toast on the left or right side of the screen with their cart items. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5883016-how-to-use-the-cart-reminder-add-on-in-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_savings.label: Cart Savings
enable_cart_savings.info: Display the total amount of savings in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5161111-how-to-enable-the-cart-savings-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_upsell.label: Cart Upsell
enable_cart_upsell.info: Add up-sells and cross-sells directly to your cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057083-how-to-enable-the-cart-upsell-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_collection_addtocart.label: Collection Add-To-Cart
enable_collection_addtocart.info: Allow visitors to add products to the cart directly from collection pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057083-how-to-enable-the-cart-upsell-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_gift_wrap.label: Gift Wrap
enable_gift_wrap.info: Allows customers to mark an order as a gift and add a unique gift message. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5596124-how-to-enable-the-gift-wrap-add-on-in-the-debutify-shopify-theme)

enable_minimum_order.label: Minimum Order
enable_minimum_order.info: Set a minimum order amount before customers are allowed to checkout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5768736-how-to-use-the-minimum-order-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__3.content: Encourage shoppers to complete their purchases with targeted nudges.

enable_cart_bubble.label: Cart Bubble
enable_cart_bubble.info: See the number of items in your cart at a glance with this convenient visual cue. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155015-how-to-use-the-cart-bubble-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

enable_cart_discount.label: Cart Discount
enable_cart_discount.info: Allow customers to enter discount codes in the cart before checkout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9795863-how-to-use-the-cart-discount-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_cart_notification.label: Cart Notification
enable_cart_notification.info: Display a notification at the bottom when a product is added to the cart, along with a 'View cart' button that opens the cart drawer. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155035-how-to-use-the-cart-notification-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

enable_customizable_products.label: Customizable Products
enable_customizable_products.info: Add several options and fields to customize your products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5462411-how-to-use-the-customizable-products-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_discount_saved.label: Discount Saved
enable_discount_saved.info: Display the discount amount of on-sale product variants on the product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054103-how-to-enable-the-discount-saved-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_inventory_quantity.label: Inventory Quantity
enable_inventory_quantity.info: Display the stock level for each product variant. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054133-how-to-display-the-stock-levels-of-each-product-variant-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_logo_list.label: Logo List
enable_logo_list.info: Add, display, and customize a list of logos on your website. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054133-how-to-display-the-stock-levels-of-each-product-variant-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_skip_cart.label: Skip Cart
enable_skip_cart.info: Send buyers straight to the checkout page, skipping the shopping cart page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5290632-how-to-enable-the-skip-cart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_social_discount.label: Social Discount
enable_social_discount.info: Offer discount codes to customers who share your products on social media. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057551-how-to-enable-the-social-discount-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_sticky_addtocart.label: Sticky Add-To-Cart
enable_sticky_addtocart.info: Display a sticky add-to-cart bar when scrolling past the add-to-cart button. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054241-how-to-enable-the-sticky-add-to-cart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_trust_badge.label: Trust Badge
enable_trust_badge.info: Display payment icons or custom trust badges under the add-to-cart and checkout buttons. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054277-how-to-enable-the-trust-badge-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_upsell_bundles.label: Upsell Bundles
enable_upsell_bundles.info: Let customers buy different products in one click by creating bundle offers. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054282-how-to-enable-the-upsell-bundles-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_upsell_popup.label: Upsell Pop-Up
enable_upsell_popup.info: Display a customizable upsell pop-up that triggers when adding a product to cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054298-how-to-enable-the-upsell-pop-up-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__4.content: Foster customer loyalty and encourage repeat purchases.

enable_newsletter_popup.label: Newsletter Pop-Up
enable_newsletter_popup.info: Display a customizable newsletter pop-up to capture your visitor's email before they leave your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054175-how-to-display-a-newsletter-pop-up-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_order_feedback.label: Order Feedback
enable_order_feedback.info: Gather customer feedback to understand their preferences and create effective marketing strategies. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242840-how-to-enable-the-order-feedback-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_testimonials.label: Testimonials
enable_testimonials.info: Showcase authentic customer feedback with star ratings, boosting product credibility and trust on your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9795791-how-to-use-the-testimonials-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_wish_list.label: Wish List
enable_wish_list.info: Allow customers to add their favorite products to a wish list they can return to later. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054299-how-to-enable-the-wish-list-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__5.content: Enhance customer satisfaction and increase sales with frictionless shopping solutions.

enable_automatic_geolocation.label: Automatic Geolocation
enable_automatic_geolocation.info: Allow users to set default language and currency based on their location. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057013-how-to-use-the-automatic-geolocation-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_back_in_stock.label: Back In Stock
enable_back_in_stock.info: Allow customers to sign up for back-in-stock alerts. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5265388-how-to-enable-the-back-in-stock-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_back_to_top.label: Back To Top
enable_back_to_top.info: Allow users to instantly return to the top of the page without having to scroll back up. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155021-how-to-use-the-back-to-top-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

enable_breadcrumbs.label: Breadcrumbs
enable_breadcrumbs.info: Help customers find their way around your store with easy-to-follow navigation paths. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155033-how-to-use-the-breadcrumbs-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

enable_cart_favicon.label: Cart Favicon
enable_cart_favicon.info: Change the page favicon to a secondary image if there is a product in cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5248732-how-to-enable-the-cart-favicon-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_collection_filters.label: Collection Filters
enable_collection_filters.info: Allow visitors to filter the products on the collection page by their desired parameters. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5290641-how-to-enable-the-collection-filters-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_collections_list.label: Collections List
enable_collections_list.info: Simplify browsing by presenting various collections on one page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9614425-how-to-use-the-collection-list-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_color_swatches.label: Color Swatches
enable_color_swatches.info: Add color swatches to your product options. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054086-how-to-add-color-swatches-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_custom_code.label: Custom Code
enable_custom_code.info: This section allows you to insert custom HTML or Liquid code to personalize your site even more.

enable_custom_currencies.label: Custom Currencies
enable_custom_currencies.info: Show prices in multiple currencies without using the Shopify Payment multi-currency converter. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057090-how-to-use-the-custom-currencies-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_delivery_date.label: Delivery Date
enable_delivery_date.info: Allow visitors to select their preferred delivery date in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5774446-how-to-enable-the-delivery-date-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_delivery_time.label: Delivery Time
enable_delivery_time.info: Display an approximate date of delivery. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054100-how-to-enable-the-delivery-time-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_facebook_messenger.label: Facebook Messenger
enable_facebook_messenger.info: Add a Facebook Messenger chat widget to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057679-how-to-add-a-facebook-messenger-chat-widget-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_faq_page.label: FAQ
enable_faq_page.info: Add a searchable question and answers module to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054110-how-to-use-the-faqs-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_featured_collection.label: Featured Collection
enable_featured_collection.info: Captivate customers with visually appealing displays, driving engagement and promoting key products and promotions. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9795751-how-to-use-the-featured-collection-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_image_with_text.label: Image With Text
enable_image_with_text.info: Enhance your store by combining impactful visuals with descriptive text. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9830795-how-to-use-the-image-with-text-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_inactive_tab_message.label: Inactive Tab Message
enable_inactive_tab_message.info: Display a different page title when the user goes to another tab. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242828-how-to-enable-the-inactive-tab-message-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_infinite_scroll.label: Infinite Scroll
enable_infinite_scroll.info: Replace paginations with a 'Load more' button or by automatically loading items as you scroll down the page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5161154-how-to-enable-the-infinite-scroll-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_instagram_feed.label: Instagram Feed
enable_instagram_feed.info: Display your Instagram feed on your store's homepage and/or product pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057122-how-to-use-the-instagram-feed-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_mega_menu.label: Mega Menu
enable_mega_menu.info: Add nested menus, products, collections, articles and more to your header navigation. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054172-how-to-create-a-mega-menu-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_menu_bar.label: Menu Bar
enable_menu_bar.info: Add a simple scrollable menu below header. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5231134-how-to-enable-the-menu-bar-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_order_tracking.label: Order Tracking
enable_order_tracking.info: Let your customers track their orders directly from your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057483-how-to-enable-the-order-tracking-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_page_speed_booster.label: Page Speed Booster
enable_page_speed_booster.info: Improve your website's conversion rate by making it faster. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227401-how-to-enable-the-page-speed-booster-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_page_transition.label: Page Transition
enable_page_transition.info: Display a preloader with your logo while the page is loading. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057511-how-to-enable-the-page-transition-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_pricing_table.label: Pricing Table
enable_pricing_table.info: Showcase product options, bundles, packages, and all other upgrade options in a side-by-side price comparison table. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054183-how-to-enable-the-pricing-table-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_bullet_points.label: Product Bullet Points
enable_product_bullet_points.info: Add short, easily digestible pieces of information about your products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227389-how-to-show-product-bullet-points-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_image_crop.label: Product Image Crop
enable_product_image_crop.info: Format all your product images in the same ratio. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057531-how-to-use-the-product-image-crop-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_swatches.label: Product Swatches
enable_product_swatches.info: Allow users to create product groups and link them as swatches on each product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5472573-how-to-enable-the-product-swatches-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_tabs.label: Product Tabs
enable_product_tabs.info: Add additional details about your products in customizable tabs. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054187-how-to-create-product-tabs-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_zooming.label: Product Zooming
enable_product_zooming.info: Zoom in for a closer, more detailed view of products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/6103560-how-to-enable-product-zooming-widget-on-images-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_quantity_breaks.label: Quantity Breaks
enable_quantity_breaks.info: Encourage larger orders with automated quantity-based discounts. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054197-how-to-enable-the-quantity-breaks-add-on-in-the-debutify-shopify-theme)

enable_quick_compare.label: Quick Compare
enable_quick_compare.info: Let your customers easily compare the features of different products and choose which one is best for them. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5792928-how-to-use-the-quick-compare-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_quick_view.label: Quick View
enable_quick_view.info: Let customers quickly view your product details before they visit the product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054198-how-to-enable-the-quick-view-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_recently_viewed.label: Recently Viewed
enable_recently_viewed.info: Display the products a visitor has seen while browsing your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057690-how-to-enable-the-recently-viewed-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_show_second_image_on_hover.label: Show Second Image On Hover
enable_show_second_image_on_hover.info: Allow customers to view a second image of a product from a different angle on mouse hover. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155040-how-to-show-second-image-on-hover)

enable_size_chart.label: Size Chart
enable_size_chart.info: Add customizable size guides with tables and images to your product pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057686-how-to-manage-the-size-chart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_smart_search.label: Smart Search
enable_smart_search.info: Show search results immediately as you type into the search field. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054239-how-to-use-the-smart-search-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_sticky_header.label: Sticky Header
enable_sticky_header.info: Keep the website header visible while scrolling for easy navigation access.  [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155042-how-to-use-the-sticky-header-add-on-in-debutify-themes)

enable_synced_variant_image.label: Synced Variant Image
enable_synced_variant_image.info: Automatically select product variants when a customer clicks a thumbnail image. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227327-how-to-enable-the-synced-variant-image-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_text_columns_with_images.label: Text Columns With Images
enable_text_columns_with_images.info: Combine images and text in a columnar layout to create visually appealing and informative sections. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/debutify/en/articles/5723239-how-to-add-text-columns-with-images-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_scrolling_banner.label: Scrolling Banner
enable_scrolling_banner.info: Create an auto-scrolling banner to highlight important messages and promotions across your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10229257-how-to-use-the-scrolling-banner-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_comparison_table.label: Comparison Table
enable_comparison_table.info: Facilitates customers in easily comparing brands/products, leading to more informed and quicker purchase decisions. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9995952-how-to-use-the-comparison-table-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7 )

enable_dbtfy_result_section.label: Result section
enable_dbtfy_result_section.info: Capture attention by highlighting your product's impact and proven benefits. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10026280-how-to-use-the-results-section-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_sales_popup_notification.label: Sales Popup Notification
enable_sales_popup_notification.info: Show real-time purchase updates to create urgency and boost your store's credibility. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10026478-how-to-use-the-sales-pop-notification-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_blog_posts.label: Blog Posts
enable_blog_posts.info: Display your blog posts on your store to engage your customers with valuable content. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9848917-how-to-use-the-blog-posts-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_dbtfy_split_video_with_text.label: Split video & text
enable_dbtfy_split_video_with_text.info: Showcase your products in a split text and video layout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9991619-how-to-use-the-split-video-text-section-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

enable_before_after_image.label: Before & After Image
enable_before_after_image.info: The Before & After Section widget allows you to showcase the effectiveness of your products or services through engaging visual transformations. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/debutify/en/articles/9991945-how-to-use-the-before-after-section-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

dbtfy_slideshow.label: Slideshow
dbtfy_slideshow.info: Showcase products and promotions with dynamic slides to captivate your store visitors. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9795839-how-to-use-the-slideshow-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-7)

paragraph__6.content: Safeguard your store and its assets from the legal threats posed by copycats and competitors.

enable_age_check.label: Age Check
enable_age_check.info: Verify the age of website visitors before they can access your content and products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057047-how-to-use-the-age-check-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_agree_to_terms.label: Agree To Terms
enable_agree_to_terms.info: Ask customers to agree with your terms and conditions before checking out. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242844-how-to-enable-the-agree-to-terms-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cookie_box.label: Cookie Box
enable_cookie_box.info: Display a cookie box to make your website GDPR-compliant. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054095-how-to-use-the-cookie-box-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_shop_protect.label: Shop Protect
enable_shop_protect.info: Protect your product description, images, articles, and other content from being stolen. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054230-how-to-use-the-shop-protect-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__7.content: Customize your brand's visual elements to create a unique and cohesive brand image.

enable_remove_debutify_branding.label: Remove Debutify Branding
enable_remove_debutify_branding.info: Remove 'Theme by Debutify' or 'Powered by Debutify' at the footer of all your store pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/7155038-how-to-remove-debutify-branding)

google_tag_manager.label: Google Tag Manager ID
google_tag_manager.info: Adding Google Tag Manager to your site may affect page speed. [Learn more](https://blog.dareboost.com/en/2018/04/how-tag-managers-impact-web-performance)

review_show_in_product_grid.label: Show in product grid
review_show_in_product_grid.info: These badges might also need to be enabled from within your Review app settings.

dbtfy_color_swatches_section_options.label: Product section variant options
dbtfy_color_swatches_section_options.info: Add variant options name with comma-separated.

dbtfy_color_swatches_grid_options.label: Product grid variant options
dbtfy_color_swatches_grid_options.info: Color swatches will be applied to all variant options with this name.

paragraph__1.content: When enabled, the native Shopify Payment multi-currency converter will be disabled. Note that Shopify doesn't allow us to convert the prices on the Checkout page.

dbtfy_custom_currencies_supported_curren.label: Supported currencies
dbtfy_custom_currencies_supported_curren.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

dbtfy_delivery_date_exclude_days.label: Delivery exclude days
dbtfy_delivery_date_exclude_days.info: Use the MON,TUE,WED,THU,FRI,SAT and SUN. Separate exclude days with commas.

dbtfy_facebook_messenger_code.label: Code
dbtfy_facebook_messenger_code.info: How to get code? Go to your Facebook page > Settings > Messaging > Add Messenger to your website > Copy & paste the code snippet.

dbtfy_infinite_scroll_loading_image.label: Loading image for endless scroll
dbtfy_infinite_scroll_loading_image.info: Leave empty to display the default loading icon.

dbtfy_inventory_quantity_threshold.label: Threshold quantity
dbtfy_inventory_quantity_threshold.info: If product quantity is higher than the threshold set, then hide product inventory quantity or show a general text.

dbtfy_menu_bar_hover_style.label: Menu hover animation
dbtfy_menu_bar_hover_style.info: This will animate menu items when it is hovered.

header__1.info: Highlight a top-level menu item with the custom color below. The mobile featured link is configured in the 'Mobile menu' section.

dbtfy_recently_viewed_bar_tab_position.label: Tab position
dbtfy_recently_viewed_bar_tab_position.info: Vertical is applicable only for the Left and Right positions.

dbtfy_shop_protect_disable_best_selling.label: Disable best selling collection
dbtfy_shop_protect_disable_best_selling.info: Make sure your collections are not sorted by best selling. [Edit collection sorting](/admin/collections)

dbtfy_cursor_img.label: Custom cursor
dbtfy_cursor_img.info: Recommend high resolution image at least 50x50 and format should be svg, png, jpg, jpeg or webp.

header__1.info: Add more than one message to enable the carousel.

text.info: Use {amount} variable to put a cart goal.

goal_amount.label: Goal amount
goal_amount.info: e.g. 70 or 70.99. Set up your free [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping) matching the amount entered above.

header__1.info: Possible values: All, Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Europe, North america, Oceania, South america.

header__2.info: Use Alpha-2 code to target to specific country from the [country codes](https://www.iban.com/country-codes) list.

goal_region.label: Region
goal_region.info: Enter continent name or country code, e.g: Europe or DE.

goal_amount.label: Goal amount
goal_amount.info: e.g. 70 or 70.99. Set up your free [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping) matching the amount entered above.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Captured information will be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages if enabled.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Captured information will be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages if enabled.

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Captured information will be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages if enabled.

text.info: {min} - minimum amount of days for delivery, {max} - maximum amount of days for delivery.

icon_display.label: Add icon before message
icon_display.info: This will add an icon before the text.

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.info: %a %A - weekdays, %b %B - months, %d - days, %y %Y - years. Lowercase letters are for the short date format.

exclude_days.label: Delivery exclude days
exclude_days.info: Use the MON,TUE,WED,THU,FRI,SAT and SUN. Separate exclude days with commas.

cutoff_time.label: Cut-off time
cutoff_time.info: Number only (24 hours format - 16:00:00 means 4PM) relative to timezone of seller.

cutoff_reached.label: Cut-off reached message
cutoff_reached.info: Displays when cut-off time is reached.

show_instagram_icon.label: Show instagram icon
show_instagram_icon.info: Make sure to add your Instagram page link in Theme settings > Social medias.

access_token.label: Access token
access_token.info: A new token should be regenerated every 2 months.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

heading.info: Collection name will be displayed by default.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

heading.info: Blog name will be displayed by default.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

time_trigger_timeout.label: Time
time_trigger_timeout.info: Popup will be displayed in X seconds.

scroll_depth_percentage.label: Scroll depth
scroll_depth_percentage.info: Popup will be displayed when customer is scrolling page by X percentages.

customer_tag.label: Tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

show_one_per_line.label: Show one point per line
show_one_per_line.info: Each product bullet point will be displayed on separate line.

option_name.label: Option name
option_name.info: If the field is empty, the product name will be used.

range.label: Quantity
range.info: Set the same "Minimum quantity of items" in your discount code settings.

range.label: Quantity
range.info: Set the same "Minimum quantity of items" in your discount code settings.

product_trigger.label: Product trigger
product_trigger.info: Leave both collection and product pickers empty to trigger upsell popup on all products.

paragraph__1.content: Show real-time purchase updates to create urgency and boost your store's credibility.

enable_multiple_purchases.label: Display notification in queue for multiple purchases occur simultaneously

show_notification_in_queue.label: Show notification in queue
show_notification_in_queue.info: The set limit to show numbers of notification in popup at time and rest will be scroll down

paragraph__2.content: Specify on which pages the notification is display

threshold_quantity.label: Threshold quantity
threshold_quantity.info: If product quantity is higher than the threshold set, then hide product inventory quantity or show a general text.

custom_badge_icon.label: Badge icon upload
custom_badge_icon.info: Recommend dimension 16x16. Format should be svg or transparent png

paragraph__1.content: Showcase your products in a split text and video layout.

video.label: Video
video.info: Format should be .mp4 or .mov. Size up to 1GB and Max resolution 4096x2160(4k)

video_link.label: Video URL
video_link.info: You can paste video url of YouTube, Vimeo, or Daily Motion.

custom_icon.label: Custom icon
custom_icon.info: Recommend dimension 16x16 and format should be svg or transparent png

paragraph__1.content: Capture attention by highlighting your product’s impact and proven benefits.

display_section_id.label: Display section ID
display_section_id.info: ID is used in the Sections group section to merge 2 sections. ID can also be put inside any button link and the button will scroll to this section.

video.label: Video
video.info: Recommend dimension portrait video. Use autoplay mp4 instead of GIFs & animated WEBPs.

result_columns.label: Column per row for Result top

button_label.label: First buton label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button

button_custom_icon.label: Custom icon
button_custom_icon.info: Recommend dimension 16x16 and format should be svg or transparent png

add_to_cart_label.label: Second button label
add_to_cart_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button

add_to_cart_custom_icon.label: Custom icon
add_to_cart_custom_icon.info: Recommend dimension 16x16 and format should be svg or transparent png

result_row_x_padding.label: Result block/row left and right padding

result_row_y_padding.label: Result block/row top and bottom padding

custom_icon.label: Custom icon
custom_icon.info: Recommend dimension 16x16 and format should be svg or transparent png

heading_text.label: Heading
heading_text.info: Bold certain words to highlight them with a different color

button_label.label: Button Label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

shop_label.label: Label
shop_label.info: Displayed if logo image is not selected.

competitor_label.label: label
competitor_label.info: Displayed if logo image is not selected

color.label: Color scheme
color.info: Custom color scheme is edited at the bottom of section settings. To edit all your theme's color, go to your color [theme settings.](/editor?context=theme)

subheading.label: Sub Heading
subheading.info: Leave the sub heading blank to hide.

information.content: Please see the links below for your account information and support channels.

billing_plans_info.content: See your current plan and change your plan anytime.

account_info.content: See your account information and settings.

articles_info.content: View our support articles and video guides.

contact_us_info.content: Contact our support team for assistance.

faq_info.content: See our frequently asked questions from customers.

feedback_info.content: See our customers feedback and submit your own.

button_link.info: If not specified, then the link will lead to the catalog page.

collection_title.label: Collection title
collection_title.info: If not specified, then the collection title will be used.

collection_image.label: Collection image
collection_image.info: If not specified, then the collection image will be used.

button_link.info: If not specified, then the link will lead to the catalog page.

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: To edit all your theme's colors, go to your color [theme settings](/admin/settings/theme)

show_bullets_and_arrows_on_hover.label: Show bullets & arrows only on hover

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: To edit all your theme's colors, go to your color [theme settings](/admin/settings/themes).

image.label: Image
image.info: This image will appear for before section

enable_split_description.label: Enable split description
enable_split_description.info: This feature allows you to show a brief description under the product price. Add the shortcode [split_description] in the HTML section of your product description to split it.

show_payment_icons.label: Show payment icons
show_payment_icons.info: Add custom icons in Theme settings > Advanced settings.

logo_svg.label: SVG
logo_svg.info: It has more priority than regular image above. [How to upload an SVG file?](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5056796-how-to-upload-a-svg-file-in-debutify-theme)

customer_tag.label: Customer tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

header__3.info: Crop your logo image as close as possible for maximum size.

image_link.label: Image link
image_link.info: Adding an image link will disable the buttons.

open_link_in_new_tab.label: Open link in a new tab

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

api_key.label: API key
api_key.info: You'll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map.

placeholder_image.label: Placeholder image
placeholder_image.info: Will be displayed if the map is not loaded.

display_type.label: Select collections to show
display_type.info: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort_type.label: Sort collections by:
sort_type.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected.

collections_per_page.label: Collections per page
collections_per_page.info: This settings only work, when select collections to show 'All' option.

email_notice.content: Email field is mandatory for form submission.

page_content.content: Edit your page content on Shopify's admin > Pages. Use the template 'contact'.

newsletter_form_heading.info: [Tell your visitors about a launch day discount.](https://www.shopify.com/blog/15514000-14-ways-to-use-offers-coupons-discounts-and-deals-to-drive-revenue-and-customer-loyalty)

enable_split_description.label: Enable split description
enable_split_description.info: This feature allows you to show a brief description under the product price. Add the shortcode [split_description] in the HTML section of your product description to split it.

customer_tag.label: Customer tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

header__1.info: Because the size and shape of the slideshow depends on the size and shape of the customer's device, your slideshow images will be cropped on some screens. Try to use images that have a focal point in the middle so that the important part of each image is always visible.

image.label: Desktop image
image.info: Recommend dimension 1600x500 and maximum 25mb size. Format should be png, jpg, bmp, webp or svg.

image_mobile.label: Mobile image
image_mobile.info: Recommend dimension 320x120 and maximum 25mb size. Format should be png, jpg, bmp, webp or svg.

slide_link.label: Slide link
slide_link.info: Adding a slide link will disable the buttons.

video.label: Desktop video
video.info: Video type can be .mp4 or .mov and maximum size 1gb

video_mobile.label: Mobile video
video_mobile.info: Video type can be .mp4 or .mov and maximum size 1gb

enable_custom_fonts.label: Enable custom fonts
enable_custom_fonts.info: Selecting a custom font will impact your page load speed.
